title: How do I update my B1's firmware and app versions?
answer:
Your B1 supports OTA updates. To update your B1's firmware and app, perform the following steps: 

 1.   Ensure that your B1 is connected to your phone properly over Bluetooth. 

 2.   Run **Huawei TalkBand o**n your phone and choose **Settings**>**About**. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=47365)


 3.  Touch **Update** **TalkBand** to update your B1's firmware. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=47366) 

 4.  Touch **Update TalkBand app** to update your Huawei TalkBand app. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=47367)
